bio:
My name is Sergei.

I am a community analyst at a large company, an Influencer, and a crypto-enthusiast with a lot of experience.
contributionDescription:
- I actively support many projects built on Optimism through Gitcoin-donations. I don't miss a single round.

- Being a major Influencer and having some connections in the crypto community at the same time, I periodically actively recommend Optimism to my audience and colleagues (always from the bottom of my heart).

- I am a fairly early user of the Optimism network (since November 2022), actively participating in all activities - for example, I have completed all Optimism quests.

- Within 3 months we plan to start developing our own project on Optimism. At the moment we are at the stage of forming a team, funding has already been raised.

contributionLinks.description: There is a website, but it's on rebranding, at the moment.

impactDescription:
- Through regular coverage of Optimism and its ecosystem in its media outlets, both the number and quality of online users has been increased.

- Thanks to my advice, right now one of the development teams is building their product on your blockchain. They were choosing between Arbitrum and Optimism, and I helped them make the right decision.

fundingSources.description: A second drop from Optimism, serving to compensate for the gas spent.
Promotion of the network in the community and recommendation to the develop team
Develop your own project on Optimism, planned within 3 months.
